## Bio

Kaitlyn Lee is a MA/PhD student in Biostatistics at the UC Berkeley mentored by 
Alejandro Schuler. Her research interests are broadly in causal inference, 
machine learning, and methods research. She is interested in developing methods 
to answer real-world questions about health and social policy in a statistically 
rigorous manner. Her current work focuses on causal inference with continuous 
treatment variables.
